comment.author: 41311545@N05
comment._content: It's a guess, but I'd say this is the launch used in the entertainments of the children's Christmas parties held aboard HMAS CANBERRA [I] at Garden Island in Dec. 1931, shown in your other Sam Hood images nearby.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/41311545@N05] It would be interesting if this really was taken at the same event, we always talk about how Hood and Hall must have crossed paths. :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
